test_message: My original goal was to save $200/month but I've only managed $80-100. I also wanted to work out 6 days a week but can only do 3-4.

result.optimization_summary: Adjusted savings and workout targets to align with recent outcomes, promoting consistency and sustainable progress.

goal_adjustments.rationale: Recently, you've consistently managed to save $80-100 per month. Rebalancing to $100/month enhances achievability and builds positive momentum, with the option to increase your goal as circumstances allow.

Your current pattern of 3-4 workouts per week is sustainable given your situation. Shifting to this as your main target will help maintain consistency and prevent burnout, while still supporting your fitness goals.

result.load_assessment: Your current goals were placing a high demand on your routine. The realistic progress you've shown suggests a more balanced approach is needed to prevent overwhelm.
result.supportive_message: You're already making meaningful progress! Adjusting your goals shows your adaptability and commitment. With these updates, you'll experience steady improvement without unnecessary pressure—celebrate these positive changes!
